name: Jane Danvers
text: Very unsanitary!! We walked in to pick up our pizza and watched an employee making a pizza with bare hands and his face mask pulled down below the nose. We were not helped, so we decided to leave after several minutes due to the poor service and unsanitary practices.

name: Tracy Coleman
text: Haven't been in years. There service and pizza was extraordinary.

name: Cristal Holland
text: There was a red curly head lady there she was very clean professional and fast she made my order with love I highly recommend it thanks will return soon!!!!

name: Bryan Schlipp Jr
text: This pizza is sooo good. The best place to get your best breadsticls with a large pizza. Godfather's Pizza is everyones a good place (well not all). They did a good job.

name: Mike Lohse
text: Good for gas station pizza

name: Sikander Singh
text: Best  pizza in town

name: Jasen Vaughan
text: It's good

name: scott miranda
text: I usually don’t eat from large food chains but was busy working on a tractor and my mechanic was hungry. The pizza was good and reasonably priced considering the quality of the pizza and price in the Chesterton area I would say it’s the best cheap pizza in the area and delivered.

name: Mike Alfaro
text: Great service!!

name: Nathan Barnett
text: Fast and honest, not the worst pizza.

name: James Griffin
text: Very good pizza, not too expensive

name: mark smith
text: Best crust (golden crust).  Best sausages. Great sauce.  Outstanding pizza!

name: Brittany Shepherd
text: I've ordered there about four times everything I had was delicious you get plenty of food for your money and that customer service was it was okay

name: Christian Hopkins
text: Since being bought by new owners they have removed specials

name: Michael Kantowski
text: Great quality in their pizzas, fair prices, and deliveries all over Chesterton! Their product and deals are better than Pizza Hut, Vals, and Duneland pizza!

name: Amanda Moore
text: Good pizza. You can grab dinner, gas and a few forgotten items like toilet paper or milk all in 1 place.

name: jeremie songer
text: Good pizza just small menu

name: Jean Pugh
text: It was  awesome

name: Tracy Swiderski
text: Sucked.

name: Michelle Addison
text: Great pizza

name: Michael Morganelli
text: Good pie

name: Zunaira Khan
text: Yummy Pizza!!! love the services too :-)

name: J Ortis
text: Great pizza and service!

name: K Blazek
text: No dine in. Only a counter in a crappy gas station. Pizza was ok though.

name: Terry J.
text: Big hard pineapple chunks...terrible sauce...pizza hut is better and has sad...
